Name: Cloud Bashers DX
About the game: So, you wanna bash some clouds huh? Well you've come to the right place! Go through 10 worlds each with different cloud types and a boss that's out to take you down. Bash them all with your trusty bat and take back the skies! Play through the deluxe version of Cloud Bashers with balancing fixes, quality of life updates, and visual improvements! Features Fly on a cloud with your trusty bat and take back the skies! Bash enough clouds to face off with ten bosses! Figure out the complexities behind over 15 different cloud types! Unlock the arcade mode and compete on the daily leaderboards!
